pros:
Best teleporting skill since it can be used in the air, without platforms around and overall speed of teleport
  • As well becomes a damaging attacking in 3rd Job with Dark Shock
Has great party utility with party auras and barriers for any situation
Has lifesteal from Draining Aura
Lots of %DEF and %Max HP, great for training pre-200
cons: Has a bit of micromanaging from party auras
Reliant on telecasting (attacking while teleporting) and teleport
Short ranged compared to other mages

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +35% + (20% when Battle Rage is active)
Crit Damage: +40% + (8% when Battle Rage is active)
Damage: +10% + (40% when Battle Rage is active) + (20% when Dark Aura is active)
Attack Speed (Weapon): 3 (additional -1 stage when Hasty Aura is active)
Damage Reduction (Regular Monsters): +25% + (15% when Blue Aura is active)
Ignore DEF: +30% + (20% when Weakening Aura is active)
Abnormal Status Resistance: 30 + (20 when Blue Aura is active)

details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Brighton in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
Training:

  • Dark Genesis - Cooldown Cutter, Reinforce and Additional Reinforce
  • Dark Aura - Boss Rush
  • Last SP free for any

Bossing:

  • Dark Aura - Boss Rush
  • Weakening Aura - Elemental Decrease
  • Blue Aura - Dispel Magic
  • Party Shield - Cooldown Cutter and Enhance

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Makes you invisible similar which when activated, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies similar to Dark Sight

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Triple Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 170%, Max Attacks: 3, Max Monsters Hit: 5
primary.desc: Strikes forward 3 times with your staff

primary.name: Combat Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Horizontal range: 210, Vertical range: 290
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details:
Can be used in the air and on ladders
  • Can still be used even if there are no platforms to teleport to

primary.name: Hasty Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 8, Speed: +10, Attack Speed +1 level\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Speed: 30, Max Speed: 20, Jump: 20, Attack Speed +2 levels, Avoidability: +15%]
details:
When Dark Shock (3rd Job) is learned, teleport range is increased
  • This function can be toggled on/off by right-clicking the skill

primary.name: Condemnation
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 10 enemies, inflicts damage to 7 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 185 + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 7. Attacking a boss 2 times will count as defeating 1 enemy. Once activated, it cannot activate again until 9 sec have passed.
primary.desc: After defeating 10 enemies, your dark spirit will unleash a deadly attack
details: Attacking a boss twice will count as defeating 1 enemy
%Damage also scales based on your Character's Level

primary.name: Staff Artist
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Critical Rate: +15%, DEF: +150

primary.name: Quad Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 220%, Max Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 5
primary.desc: Strikes forward 4 times with your staff

primary.name: Dark Chain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 600%, Max Monsters Hit: 8, Knock Down Duration: 8 sec
primary.desc: Creates a chain that pulls in and stuns enemies
details: Can be linked with any Blow-type skills

primary.name: Draining Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 28, Heals you for 1% of damage dealt. Cannot recover again for 5 sec after a recovery takes place. Damage dealt by Battle Mage also heals any party members within the range of Draining Aura.\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Max HP recovery every 4 sec: 2% + 1000, Max HP recovery every time you eliminate an enemy: 1%]
primary.desc: While active, your attacks restore a percentage of the damage dealt as HP
details: [Passive]: Permanently restores some HP every few seconds and whenever you defeat an enemy you restore some %Max HP
The healing cannot exceed 15% of your Max HP
Damage dealt by the caster also recovers the HP of nearby party members

primary.name: Staff Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Attack Speed increased for 200 sec

primary.name: Staff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Staff Mastery: +50%, Magic ATT: +30, Critical Hit Rate: +20%

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: Ordinary Conversion
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +150%

primary.name: Grim Contract
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 8 enemies, inflicts damage to 8 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 190 + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 8. Once activated, it cannot activate again until 8 sec have passed.
details: Reduces number of enemies required to activate to 8 and time between activations to 8 secs
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

primary.name: Quintuple Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Damage: 235%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Strikes forward 5 times with your staff

primary.name: Battle Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 900%.\n[Passive Effect: Dark Chain's Damage: +50%]
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pulling enemies you pass through
details: Can be linked with any Blow-type skills
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of

primary.name: Blue Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12 per sec, Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Damage Taken: -15%.\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, DEF: +150%, Damage Taken: -25%]

primary.name: Dark Shock
primary.shortDesc: Increases the MP Cost of Combat Teleport by 15. Teleporting creates a streak of black lightning between your start and end positions. [Black Lightning] Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 4. Afflicts enemies with Dark Brand for 5 sec. Attacking enemies with Dark Brand consumes the brand and deals an additional 350% damage 4 number of times. Brand-consuming attacks deal 20% bonus damage against bosses.
primary.desc: When toggled, your teleporting creates a shock attack that applies a debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Attacking this enemy consumes the debuff and deals an additional attack
  • If the enemy is a boss, the attack that consumes the debuff deals increased %Damage

primary.name: Battle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Dark Conditioning
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +1, Avoidability: 25%, Speed: 30, Max Speed: 10

primary.name: Grim Contract II
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 6 enemies, inflicts damage to 8 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 195 + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 10. Once activated, it cannot activate again until 6 sec have passed.
details: Reduces number of enemies required to activate to 6 and time between activations to 6 secs
Increases %Damage and number of hits

primary.name: Finishing Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 330%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6, Crit Rate: +25%, Bonus Ignore DEF: 20%
primary.desc: Strikes forward 6 times with your staff
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Dark Genesis
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 8, Stun Duration: 4 sec\n[Final Attack Skills] Cooldown: 30 sec. Making a direct attack during cooldown has a 60% chance to hit a single enemy with lightning, dealing 220% damage.\nPassive Effect: +60% damage on Dark Chain, Battle Burst, and Dark Shock]
details: Ignores Damage Reflect
[Final Attack]: While skill is on cooldown, attacks have a chance to hit a single enemy with a lightning strike
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of , , and

primary.name: Dark Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 16, Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: Magic ATT +15%]

primary.name: Weakening Aura
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per sec: 26, Enemy DEF: -20%. Requires 2 sec to apply but will be in effect 20 sec after aura deactivation.\nCooldown: 3 sec

primary.name: Battle Rage
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Damage: +40%, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +8%
Reduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 2.
Excludes Condemnation, Ambassador Scythe when enhanced by Aura Scythe, Altar of Annihilation, and Grim Harvest from max enemies hit reduction.
[Passive Effects: Max HP +30%, Max MP +30%]
details:
While active, you can only target enemy
  • Excludes , (Ambassador Scythe), , , and
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP/MP

primary.name: Party Shield
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Duration 40 sec, -10% damage when hit with an attack that inflicts damage of a certain proportion of Max HP.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Creates a shield that increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Staff Expert
primary.shortDesc: Staff Mastery: +70%. Magic ATT: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Magic Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Spell Boost
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +25%, Damage: +10%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Grim Contract III
primary.shortDesc: After defeating 6 enemies, inflicts damage to 10 enemies on your next attack. Damage: 200 + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 12. Once activated, it cannot activate again until 5 sec have passed.
details: Reduces time between activations to 5 secs
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit

hyperPassive.name: Dark Genesis - Additional Reinforce
hyperPassive.desc: Increases %Damage to the Final Attack lightning strike

hyperPassive.name: Weakening Aura - Elemental Decrease
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Decreases Elemental Resistance by 10%, increases final damage enemies receive by 10%.
details: Does not stack with other buffs that reduces %Elemental Resistance

hyperPassive.name: Blue Aura - Dispel Magic
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Clears Status on party members every 5 sec.

hyperPassive.name: Party Shield - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Damage reduction rate on attacks by ratio of max HP +10%.

hyperActive.name: Master of Death
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30 sec, Number of Attacks Blow skill: +1\nnumber of required souls reduced to 1, Condemnation Final Damage: +50%, Reduces Condemnation cooldown by 0.5 sec every time you successfully use a dark-attribute attack (besides Condemnation).\nCooldown: 200 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack for Blow-type skills and provides bonus effects to
details:
While active, gains the following effects:
  • Reduced number of enemies required to activate (to 5 enemies)
  • Attack has increased %Final Damage
  • Cooldown of is slightly reduced every time you use a Dark-attribute attack

hyperActive.name: Sweeping Staff
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 5, Enemies Hit: 8
hyperActive.desc: Swings a giant staff and smashes it into the ground

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Aura Scythe
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10, Damage: 1000%, enemies in range are frozen.\nArea stays icy for 15 sec, periodically inflicting 750% damage and freezing stacks to enemies caught in it.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Grants the effects of all your auras and alters your Blow-type skill into a slashing attack
details: While active, the special attack can be toggled on or off by pressing the skill again

fifthMain.name: Altar of Annihilation
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Altar Duration: 40 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 4
The orb takes 0.8 sec to move to the next altar. After 2 altars, the time to travel that distance is reduced by 15% for every additional altar.
A new altar can be summoned every 25 sec, up to 4 altars.
Enemies hit gain Dark Brand.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an altar where when there are more than two altars active, an orb will travel between altars damaging enemies that it passes through
details: A new altar is gained every 25 secs, up to 4 altars can be held at a time
Orb will apply the debuff from

fifthMain.name: Grim Harvest
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, summons the Grim Harvest that attacks for 30 sec every 4 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 12
Use the skill again to re-summon near you, can be used once every 10 sec.
If the Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, the duration increases by 0.2 sec per 1 enemy. If a boss was attacked, the duration increases by 2 sec. Duration increased to up to 3 sec for each attack.
Attack interval becomes 50% with the Master of Death applied, but duration is not increased with attacks
Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant reaper that attacks nearby enemies
details:
Using the Skill again will re-summoned near you
  • Can be used every 10 secs

If Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, the duration is increased slightly
  • If the enemy is a boss instead, the duration is increased whenever the summon hits it
If is active, the time between attacks is reduced but attacks from the reaper will not increase the duration of the summon

fifthMain.name: Abyssal Lightning
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 35, periodically creates 2 netherworld passages, the passages remain for 15 sec, and up to 4 can exist in the map.
Black Lightning: MP Cost: 75, Lightning Created: 3 times, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 5, Critical Rate: 100%, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%, Final Damage: 80% only when activating instead of Dark Shock
Cooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances and periodically creates passageways that you can teleport to
details:
To teleport to a passage, press the Skill Key and any Arrow Key together to move to the nearest passage
  • Up to 4 passageways can exist at a time
Enhanced has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
You are invincible at the initial cast and ending of the skill
Unaffected Damage Reflect

meta: Battle Mage is an INT mage class part of the Resistance. What's special about Battle Mages is that they have special aura buffs that affect party members as well. There are some useful buffs such as %Boss Damage and Attack Speed boosts. As well, Battle Mages has a dark spirit that follows them around and periodically attacks alongside you
